meaning_str.bing:
adj. 活跃的；积极的；定期进行的；起作用的
n. 主动语态
网络. 主动的；激活；活动

活跃的；积极的；定期进行的；起作用的

积极的；活跃的；有活力的；精力充沛的；活泼的；主动的；有效的；起作用的；运作中的；行动中的；忙碌的；在职的；工作的；主动语态的

1.en: Thus we regarded that resveratrol was one of the main active components in GKEs on inhibiting FAS.
1.cn: 我们认为白藜芦醇是葡萄皮提取物中抑制FAS的主要成分之一。

2.en: Before I was a work-at-home-mom, I had a very active job that kept me on my feet all day.
2.cn: 在我成为一位在家工作的母亲之前，我从事一份机动性很高的职业，整天都要走来走去。

3.en: Body on the right to force the main active ankle, pushing the body to throw the direction of lower limb rotation.
3.cn: 身体右侧，以踝关节积极主动用力为主，带动身体下肢向投掷方向转动。

0.en: We are in active litigation at this moment, Mr. Chairman...
0.cn: 我们此刻正在进行积极的上诉，主席先生。

1.en: But am I correct in assuming that your husband will be an active vice president?
1.cn: 但是我没猜错的话，你丈夫会是一位行事积极的副总统。

2.en: It's harder to keep an active VP out of the press than in it, but it's possible if we give the media just enough to keep them from starving.
2.cn: 想让媒体不去关注积极的副总统是比较难的。但我们可以让媒体刚好有些料可追，不至于什么都拿不到。

3.en: Hey, Baymax, I didn't know you were still active.
3.cn: 你好，大白，我不知道你还能用。

4.en: In what way? We believe there's an active wiretap.
4.cn: 在哪个方面？我们相信确有电话窃听。

6.en: So since the majority of you are or will become sexually active at some point…
6.cn: 所以，既然你们大部人现在或是总有一天会需求旺盛...

7.en: Exactly. And, in fact, that area has been a region of very active wind development.
7.cn: 事实上，那地方风能发展已经非常活跃。

8.en: It wouldn't be the worst thing if we were more active. Oh. You make an excellent point.
8.cn: 我们多运动一点也不是什么坏事啊，兄台此言甚是有理。

9.en: It doesn't matter. As long as we steer clear of whichever sector is active, we'll be safe.
9.cn: 无所谓了，避开活跃中的区域我们就安全。

10.en: How many planes are we looking at? During the peak portion of the day, we're 5,000 to 6,000 flights active.
10.cn: 有多少架飞机？在高峰期有5000到6000架活跃航班。

11.en: And how long have you been active on Scabbit, Mr. Irvin? From the beginning. The very beginning. Hi, Darryl.
11.cn: 你活跃于「瞎掰网」多久了，艾文先生？从一开始从网站建立就开始了，你好，达尔。

12.en: Does our warrant restrict listening to a law firm in active litigation with us for a non-terroristic action?
12.cn: 我们是否有权监听一家正起诉我们的律所，尽管不涉及恐怖主义？

13.en: Oh, I don't know. I kind of promised myself I'd get off the computer, be more physically active. Get some exercise.
13.cn: 我说不准，我答应过自己要远离电脑，多点锻炼身体，多做些运动。

14.en: What are all those lights up on that screen right there? Those are flights. Those are the active flights in the system right now.
14.cn: 那些屏幕上的光点是什么？是飞机航班。这些是系统中活跃的航线。

15.en: It's a renegade unit. We don't know who they are yet. You're telling me there's an active IRA unit on the loose you know nothing about? Yes, I am.
15.cn: 那是个叛逃的分支。虽然现在还不清楚成员到底是谁。你是说有一群活跃的IRA成员已经失去了控制，你们对具体情况一无所知？是的，是这样。

16.en: I read an article in the paper the other day that said that although US teenagers are not the most sexually active, we have the highest rate of teenage pregnancy, okay?
16.cn: 有天，我读到一篇文章上面说，虽然美国青年并不算是最性活跃的，但我们的青少年怀孕率是最高的，知道吗？
